content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) competed at the [1988 Summer Olympics](/wiki/1988_Summer_Olympics) in [Seoul](/wiki/Seoul), [South Korea](/wiki/South_Korea). ## Competitors The following is the list of number of competitors in the Games. SportMenWomenTotal[Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_1988_Summer_Olympics)202[Shooting](/wiki/Shooting_at_the_1988_Summer_Olympics)011[Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1988_Summer_Olympics)505Total718 ## Results by event ### Shooting - [Khatijah Surattee](/wiki/Khatijah_Surattee) ### Swimming **Men's 50m Freestyle** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) - Heat — 23.08 - B-Final — 23.39 (→ 11th place) - [Oon Jin Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Gee) - Heat — 24.86 (→ did not advance, 45th place) **Men's 100m Freestyle** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) - Heat — 52.53 (→ did not advance, 40th place) - [Oon Jin Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Gee) - Heat — 53.26 (→ did not advance, 43rd place) **Men's 200m Freestyle** - [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)) - Heat — 1:56.44(→ did not advance, 43rd place) - [Oon Jin Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Gee) - Heat — 1:57.28 (→ did not advance, 46th place) **Men's 400m Freestyle** - [Desmond Koh](/wiki/Desmond_Koh) - Heat — 4:15.54 (→ did not advance, 44th place) **Men's 100m Backstroke** - [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)) - Heat — 57.34 - B-Final — 57.72 (→ did not advance, 14th place) **Men's 200m Backstroke** - [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)) - Heat — 2:08.65 (→ did not advance, 31st place) **Men's 100m Breaststroke** - [Ng Yue Meng](/wiki/Ng_Yue_Meng) - Heat — 1:05.87 (→ did not advance, 41st place) **Men's 200m Breaststroke** - [Ng Yue Meng](/wiki/Ng_Yue_Meng) - Heat — 2:30.74 (→ did not advance, 47th place) **Men's 100m Butterfly** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) - Heat — 57.41 (→ did not advance, 35th place) **Men's 200m Butterfly** - [Desmond Koh](/wiki/Desmond_Koh) - Heat — 2:10.86 (→ did not advance, 37th place) **Men's 200m Individual Medley** - [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)) - Heat — 2:11.57 (→ did not advance, 34th place) - [Desmond Koh](/wiki/Desmond_Koh) - Heat — 2:14.77 (→ did not advance, 41st place) **Men's 4 × 100 m Freestyle Relay** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong), [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)), [Oon Jin Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Gee), and [Desmond Koh](/wiki/Desmond_Koh) - Heat — 3:34.54 (→ did not advance, 15th place) **Men's 4 × 100 m Medley Relay** - [David Lim](/wiki/David_Lim_(swimmer)), [Ng Yue Meng](/wiki/Ng_Yue_Meng), [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong), and [Oon Jin Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Gee) - Heat — 3:52.86 (→ did not advance, 17th place) ### Sailing - [Chan Joseph](/wiki/Chan_Joseph) - [Siew Shaw Her](/wiki/Siew_Shaw_Her) - Official Olympic Reports This [1988 Olympics](/wiki/1988_Summer_Olympics)-related article is a stub. title: Singapore at the 1988 Summer Olympics
